Windlord arrived quickly at the base and ran towards the CR. Quickly He 
placed glenty Emphath in one CR and took the Orb. "Soon you will be alright, 
love... Soon" He kissed her and close the door. He sat round the CR with th 
Orb in his hands. He would be there until Emphat left the Chamber
